channel.title: CVE Feed for Petri Damstén -- Fullscreen Galleria
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Petri Damstén -- Fullscreen Galleria

item.title: CVE-2024-29801|2024-08-02T01:17:57.319Z -- petri%20damst%C3%A9n -- fullscreen%20galleria
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Petri Damstén Fullscreen Galleria allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Fullscreen Galleria: from n/a through 1.6.11.
